sentences.en: "You're worn out, Laura," he said. "Go home and get some rest."
sentences.cn: “你太累了，劳拉，”他说，“回家休息一下吧。”

sentences.en: a worn patch on the carpet
sentences.cn: 地毯上一小块磨破的地方

sentences.en: Before the race, he is fine. But afterwards he is worn out.
sentences.cn: 赛前他状态很好，赛后就筋疲力尽了。

sentences.en: Before you is a well-worn path of beaten earth.
sentences.cn: 在你面前是一条踩出来的陈年小道。

sentences.en: Even in the dim light the equipment looked old and time-worn.
sentences.cn: 即便在昏暗的光线下，那台设备也显得陈旧不堪。

sentences.en: Extreme caution should be exercised when buying part-worn tyres.
sentences.cn: 购买部分磨损轮胎时要格外当心。

sentences.en: His fingers poked through the worn tips of his gloves.
sentences.cn: 他的手指从手套的破指尖处露了出来。

sentences.en: Most of the trek is along worn paths.
sentences.cn: 大部分时候都是沿着被人踩得坑坑洼洼的小路跋涉。

sentences.en: She was looking very haggard and worn.
sentences.cn: 她看上去非常憔悴和疲惫。

sentences.en: Steel cable will be used to replace worn ropes.
sentences.cn: 将用钢缆替换磨损的绳索。

sentences.en: The flagstones beneath their feet were worn smooth by centuries of use.
sentences.cn: 他们脚下的石板路经过数百年的踩踏，磨得光溜溜的。

sentences.en: The heels of my shoes have (been) worn down.
The man had a worn, weathered face.
sentences.cn: 这个男人有张饱经沧桑的脸。

sentences.en: The past few days had really worn him out.
sentences.cn: 过去的几天真把他给累坏了。

sentences.en: The top can be worn buttoned up or open over a T-shirt.
sentences.cn: 这件上衣可以系上纽扣，也可以里面套件T恤敞开穿。

sentences.en: This thing has plumb worn me out.
To use a well-worn cliche, it is packed with information.
sentences.cn: 说得老套一点，其内容翔实。

words.tran_cn: 可穿用的，可佩带的；耐用的
磨损的；穿用的；令人疲倦的
服装，穿着；耐用性，耐久性；损耗
穿；磨损（wear的过去分词）；佩戴

trans.tran_en: a worn object is old and damaged, especially because it has been used a lot

trans.tran_cn: 穿；磨损（wear的过去分词）；佩戴
